text: He muminagana! Tomara ya uparjana kara [1] ebam amara ya yamina theke tomadera jan'ya utpadana kari [2] ta theke ya utkrsta ta byaya kara ebam nikrsta bastu byaya karara sankalpa karo na, athaca tomara ta grahana karabe na, yadi na tomara cokha bandha kare thaka.
